bill_title: revise the rule-making authority regarding the mowing of ditches on the state trunk highway system.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the rule-making authority regarding the mowing of ditches on the state trunk highway system. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 31-5-21 be amended to read as follows: 31-5-21. The Transportation Commission may, by rules promulgated pursuant to chapter 1- 26, authorize the mowing of ditches on the state trunk highway system. The rules shall establish when mowing may be done, by whom mowing may be done, how and where mowing may be done, and the time limit for removal of hay if mowing is done for hay production. However, the rules shall provide that the original owner or assigns of land abutting the ditches on the state trunk highway system shall be given priority for mowing. In addition, no rules may be promulgated that would prohibit the mowing of a ditch on the state trunk highway system after June fifteenth of each year. 300 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.029 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
